CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Fixes Samsung's issue
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Fixes the problem of analyzing receipts encountered with some Samsung devices. If the photo of the receipts does not work, please tick this parameter.
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Fixes the problem of analyzing receipts encountered with some Samsung devices. If the photo of the receipts does not work, please tick this parameter.
